name: 300dpi Memento Mori
description:
Experiencing loss that's weighed down by the largest scanner I've ever personally owned. Run this game in the background as a constant reminder of your mortality, and my increasingly large familial digital footprint.

  • Click the scanner to die.
  • Click the photo to forget.
  • Press Escape to quit the game.

Literally only possible because of this open source "Unity Desktop Overlay" by pheonise.
